    @allure.story("卷宗上传")
    @allure.title("上传单个文件")
    def test_02_upload_single_file(self):
        """测试上传单个文件"""
        try:
            logger.info("开始单文件上传测试")
            with allure.step("点击上传单个文件按钮"):
                upload_single_button = self.wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable((
                    By.XPATH, "//div[@class='tree-button-group ant-btn-group']//button[3]"
                )))
                upload_single_button.click()
                time.sleep(1)

                self._upload_file(file_path, "single")
    
            logger.info("单文件上传成功")

                name="single_file_upload_success",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
